item.title: meme generator challenge writeup
item.description: This challenge was in Blackhat CTF Qualifications 2022 and we have participated under the team 0xCha0s, we have managed to solve multiple challenges. this challenge was ranked medium for 250 pts .

item.title: Hacker Ts challenge writeup
item.description: Nahamcon ctf 2022 was held from the 28th of April Until the 30th of the month , and we have participated under the team 0xcha0s. this challenge idea was pretty new to me so it is helpful to document it in this writeup
